sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const coin = ({ icon, coinName, symbol, price, volume, priceChange, marketcap }) => { return (

{coinName}

{symbol}

${price}

${volume.toLocaleString()}

{priceChange < 0 ? (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

) : (

{priceChange.toFixed(2)}%

)}

Mkt cap : ${marketcap.toLocaleString()}

) } export default coin
